description: bitcoinist.com: In a significant development, Tether, the issuer of the widely used stablecoin USDT, has acquired a $100 million stake in Bitdeer Technologies Group, a US-listed Bitcoin miner owned by Chinese billionaire Jihan Wu.  Notably, the deal includes an option for Tether to purchase an addi…
title: Tether Makes Major Move Into Bitcoin Mining With $100 Million Investment In This Firm — Blockchair N
